title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero Trust for Agentic Systems: Managing Non-Human Identities at Scale (SEC211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理系统的零信任：大规模管理非人类身份 (SEC211)
abstract: Agentic systems—AI-driven applications that autonomously act across services—are transforming enterprise workflows, but they also create a surge in non-human identities (NHIs) and secrets that expand the attack surface. In this session, we’ll explore a vulnerable agentic application scenario to illustrate the risks of static credentials, permissive access, and leaked secrets. We’ll then demonstrate how HashiCorp Vault and HCP Vault Radar enable a zero-trust architecture that mitigates these threats while preserving developer agility. Attendees will leave with practical strategies to secure agentic systems from development to production on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 代理系统——能够跨服务自主行动的AI驱动应用程序——正在改变企业工作流程，但它们也会导致非人类身份(NHI)和密钥激增，从而扩大攻击面。在本次会议中，我们将探讨一个易受攻击的代理应用程序场景，以说明静态凭证、宽松访问和泄露密钥的风险。然后，我们将演示HashiCorp Vault和HCP Vault Radar如何实现零信任架构，在保持开发人员敏捷性的同时缓解这些威胁。与会者将获得从开发到生产环境在AWS上保护代理系统的实用策略。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴HashiCorp提供。
